ValidationRule.description: Prevent users (except for admins, IT support) from editing the status on internal support case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = "Internal Support" && (NOT($Permission.Support_Case_Admin) && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator") && (ISPICKVAL(Status, "In Progress") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Waiting")|| ISPICKVAL(Status, "Completed") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Cancelled"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only members of the support team can update the case status.
